titleStmt.title: A copie of a letter sent from the agitators of his Excellency Sir Thomas Fairfax's armie, to all the honest sea-men of England: heartily and cordially declaring their reall intentions to the peace and prosperity of the kingdome, and the firme setling and establishing of all the just interests thereof, into the hands and possessions the right owners of them. Dated at S. Albans 21. June 1647. Published by the order and speciall desire of the said agitators.
titleStmt.author: Audley, Lewes.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end by Lewes Audley and 23 others.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
